RATING 5.0 Denny's Restaurant American, Casual/Family, Fast Food, Breakfast 20565 Eureka Road, Taylor (734) 281-1331 LATEST REVIEW Food was very good. Restaurant was extremely busy but they still managed to serve my food in a timely fashion and correct. Waitress was friendly but professional. REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO
RATING 4.0 Panda Gardens Restaurant Chinese, Fast Food 11780 Telegraph Rd, Taylor (734) 287-2700 LATEST REVIEW The quality and quantiy of food is very good. Can't beat the prices. The people are friendly. Larger parties be prepared to wait a little but you won't be disappointed. Annette&Ro loyal customers. REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO
